001import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
002import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
003import javax.swing.JDialog;
004import javax.swing.JPanel;
005import java.awt.Color;
006import java.awt.BorderLayout;
007import java.util.HashMap;
008import java.awt.event.ItemListener;
009import javax.swing.JComboBox;
010import javax.swing.JLabel;
011import java.awt.event.ItemEvent;
012import javax.swing.JTextArea;
013import java.awt.Dimension;
014
015/**
016 * Décrivez votre classe TradeButton ici.
017 *
018 * @author (votre nom)
019 * @version (un numéro de version ou une date)
020 */
021public class WriteButton extends PopupButton implements ActionListener {
022    private UserInterface aUI;
023    private GameEngine aGE;
024    
025    private MC aMC;
026    
027    private JDialog aDialog;
028    private JPanel aMainPanel;
029    private JPanel aButtonPanel;
030    
031    private Color aBGColor;
032    private Color aTextColor;
033    private Color aHoverBGColor;
034    private Color aHoverTextColor;
035    
036    private ConfirmButton aConfirmButton;
037    private CancelButton aCancelButton;
038    
039    public static String TARGET;
040    public static JTextArea CONTENT;
041    
042    public WriteButton(final String pText, final UserInterface pUI) {
043        super(pText);
044        this.aUI = pUI;
045        this.aGE = this.aUI.getGE();
046        this.aMC = this.aGE.getMC();
047        
048        this.aBGColor = new Color(56, 51, 51);
049        this.aTextColor = new Color(245, 240, 240);
050        this.aHoverBGColor = new Color(45, 40, 40);
051        this.aHoverTextColor = new Color(155, 150, 150);
052        
053        this.CONTENT = new JTextArea();
054        
055        this.addActionListener(this);
056    }
057    
058    @Override
059    public void actionPerformed(final ActionEvent pE) {
060        PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD = this.getText();
061        this.createDialog(this.aMC, this.aUI, this.aGE);
062    }
063    
064    public static void createDialog(final MC pMC, final UserInterface pUI, final GameEngine pGE) {
065        HashMap<String, Item> vItems = pMC.getItemList().getItems();
066        if(checkWriteCondition(pMC)) {
067            // String vTargetName;
068            PNJ vTarget;
069            
070            Color vBGColor = new Color(56, 51, 51);
071            Color vTextColor = new Color(240, 240, 240);
072            JPanel vMainPanel = new JPanel();
073            JPanel vButtonPanel = new JPanel();
074            JPanel vTargetPanel = new JPanel();
075            JPanel vContentPanel = new JPanel();
076            
077            CONTENT.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(500, 300));
078            
079            vContentPanel.add(CONTENT);
080            
081            JDialog vDialog = new JDialog(pUI.getFrame(), JDialog.ModalityType.APPLICATION_MODAL);
082            ConfirmButton vConfirmButton = new ConfirmButton("Confirmer", vDialog, pUI);
083            CancelButton vCancelButton = new CancelButton("Annuler", vDialog, pUI);
084            
085            
086            JComboBox vCombobox = new JComboBox();
087            for(String vPNJName : GameEngine.GAME_PNJ.keySet()) {
088                vCombobox.addItem(GameEngine.GAME_PNJ.get(vPNJName).getFullName());
089            }
090            
091            TARGET = (String)vCombobox.getItemAt(0);
092            
093            vDialog.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
094            
095            vMainPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
096            vMainPanel.setBackground(vBGColor);
097            
098            vButtonPanel.setBackground(vBGColor);
099            
100            vTargetPanel.setBackground(vBGColor);
101            
102            // vTargetPanel.add(vTargetLabel);
103            vTargetPanel.add(vCombobox);
104            
105            vButtonPanel.add(vConfirmButton);
106            vButtonPanel.add(vCancelButton);
107            
108            vMainPanel.add(vButtonPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
109            vMainPanel.add(vContentPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
110            vMainPanel.add(vTargetPanel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
111            
112            vDialog.add(vMainPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
113            vDialog.setSize(600, 400);
114            vDialog.setUndecorated(true);
115            vDialog.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
116            
117            vCombobox.addItemListener(new ItemListener() {
118                @Override
119                public void itemStateChanged(final ItemEvent pE) {
120                    TARGET = (String)vCombobox.getSelectedItem();
121                    System.out.println(TARGET);
122                }
123            });
124            
125            vDialog.setVisible(true);
126        } else {
127            if(!(vItems.containsValue(pGE.GAME_ITEM.get("dactylotype")) || vItems.containsValue(pGE.GAME_ITEM.get("plume")))) {
128                System.out.println("Je n'ai pas de quoi écrire...");
129            } else if(!vItems.containsValue(pGE.GAME_ITEM.get("feuille")) && !vItems.containsValue(pGE.GAME_ITEM.get("encre"))) {
130                System.out.println("Il me manque une feuille et de l'encre...");
131            } else if(!vItems.containsValue(pGE.GAME_ITEM.get("feuille"))) {
132                System.out.println("Il me manque une feuille...");
133            } else if(!vItems.containsValue(pGE.GAME_ITEM.get("encre"))) {
134                System.out.println("Il me manque de l'encre...");
135            }
136        }
137    }
138    
139    private static boolean checkWriteCondition(final MC pMC) {
140        HashMap<String, Item> vItems = pMC.getItemList().getItems();
141        return vItems.containsValue(GameEngine.GAME_ITEM.get("feuille")) && vItems.containsValue(GameEngine.GAME_ITEM.get("encre")) && (vItems.containsValue(GameEngine.GAME_ITEM.get("plume")) || vItems.containsValue(GameEngine.GAME_ITEM.get("dactylotype")));
142    }
143}
